name: eidolon-labs-blog
description: Personal site and blog for technical articles and experimentations.
author: zipang

scripts.sync: sync-files theme/assets public/assets && sync-files theme/admin public/admin && copyfiles theme/*.* public/
scripts.watch: sync-files --watch theme/assets public/assets && sync-files --watch theme/admin public/admin && sync-files --watch theme/config.yml public/config.yml
